00016 LList* Parser::parseStream(istream & stream) { //predela stream na string a pak zavolá parseString
00017     string str;
00018 
00019     stream.seekg(0);
00020     int length = stream.tellg();
00021     if (length == -1) { // spatny stream (neexistujici soubor)
00022         throw IOException();
00023     }
00024 
00025     stream.seekg(0);
00026 
00027     str.reserve(length);
00028 
00029     while (!stream.eof()) {
00030         str += stream.get();
00031     }
00032 
00033     return this->parseString(str);
00034 }

00036 LList* Parser::parseString(string & s) {
00037     this->tokenizer.tokenizeString(s);
00038 
00039     LList *l = this->n_List(s); // celej zdroják je seznam příkazů
00040     return l;
00041 }

00043 Elem * Parser::parseElem() {
00044     Elem * e = NULL;
00045 
00046     string tokRepr;
00047 
00048     token tok = this->tokenizer.nextToken(tokRepr);
00049 
00050     switch (tok) {
00051         case LIST_BEGIN: // zacatek noveho expr. = leva zavorka
00052             //                e = LList(tokRepr);
00053 
00054             e = this->n_List(tokRepr);
00055 
00056             //                if (this->tokenizer.nextToken(tokRepr) != LIST_END) {
00057             //                    cout <<"NEUZAVRENA ZAVORKA"<<endl;
00058             //                    return NULL; //TODO: throw neuzavrena zavorka
00059             //                }else {
00060             //                    cout <<"UZAVRENA Z"<<endl;
00061             //                    break;
00062             //                }
00063             break;
00064 
00065         case STRING_BEGIN:
00066             e = this->n_String(tokRepr);
00067             break;
00068 
00069         case INT:
00070             e = this->n_Int(tokRepr);
00071             break;
00072 
00073 
00074         case SYMBOL:
00075             e = this->n_Symbol(tokRepr);
00076             break;
00077 
00078         case LIST_END:
00079             return NULL;
00080 
00081         case 0:
00082             return NULL;
00083     }
00084 
00085     return e;
00086 }

00088 LList * Parser::n_List(string & tokRepr) { //vrati list s elementama; necheckuje zavorky
00089     LList *l = new LList;
00090     Elem * e;
00091     l->line = this->tokenizer.line;
00092     l->col = this->tokenizer.col;
00093 
00094     while ((e = this->parseElem())) {
00095         l->add(e);
00096     }
00097 
00098     return l;
00099 }

00101 LInt * Parser::n_Int(string & tokRepr) {
00102     LInt * li = new LInt(tokRepr);
00103     li->line = this->tokenizer.line;
00104     li->col = this->tokenizer.col;
00105 
00106     return li;

00114     return lstr;
